Name: assign_team_to_project
Description: Binary decision to assign a specific Team to a specific Project

Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Binary decision to assign a specific Worker to a specific Team

Name: assign_story_to_sprint
Description: Binary decision to include a specific User Story in a specific Sprint

Name: assign_task_to_worker
Description: Binary decision to assign a specific Task to a specific Worker

Name: story_point_estimate
Description: The estimated story points for a User Story

Name: sprint_duration
Description: The duration of a sprint in days

Name: team_velocity
Description: The planned velocity for a team in a given sprint

Name: project_priority
Description: The numerical priority level of a project (higher = more important)

Name: feature_priority
Description: The numerical priority level of a feature within a backlog

Name: worker_availability_pct
Description: The percentage of time a worker is available in a sprint

Name: ceremony_duration
Description: The allocated duration in minutes for a Scrum ceremony

Name: skill_level
Description: The proficiency level assigned to a worker for a skill
